/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The buildings lining the street are painted in shades of gray and white, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The sun is shining brightly, casting shadows on the ground and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
